title: Legacy skin help?
body: So if championship riven is able to be purchased again how about black alistar?

replies.body: It's rito, don't take anything they say as definite, if they see an opportunity for revenue that outweighs the player base complaints they will most definitely do it, but saying that the only sacred thing left in this game is black Alistar so I wouldn't count on it

Black alistar isnt legacy its limited 

_(the difference being that legacy skins come back, and limited ones don't.)_

but if history is anything to go by, riot will eventually bring Black alistar back, like they did with Haunting Nocturne, Champ riven and the limited skins.
But i cant promise.. no one knows what goes through their heads at riot.

But in any case, there are no current plans to bring black alistar back. _(which is annoying because its his best skin) _

Championship riven was always an exception to the legacy skin because it was treated as a limited skin which is a skin type that was only obtainable at one point and black alistar was a limited skin. Championship riven came back because the zed skin finished off the team
Championship riven came back because riot knew it was the most wanted skin in the game and that they would make a killing from it*

Black Alistar.
Your kidding right?
It's unavailable *INDEFINTELY* because you needed to pre-order this game.
That was over 10 years ago.

The difference is that:

Legacy - Skin that comes out rarely due to special occasions.
Black Alistar - Never comes out, because if you find a guy that has black alistar, you find someone who's played since the beta days of the game.

Championship riven was unavailable _INDEFINITELY_ as well. And now look.

Nothing is impossible when all that needs to happen is for 1 important person at riot to change their mind about making it available again.
